Enumeration Type Documentation

enum OOOoyalaPlayerActionAtEnd

Defines player behavior after video playback has ended, defaults to OOOoyalaPlayerActionAtEndContinue

Enumerator
OOOoyalaPlayerActionAtEndContinue 

Start playing next video if available, otherwise pause

OOOoyalaPlayerActionAtEndPause 

Pause at the end of the video

OOOoyalaPlayerActionAtEndStop 

Stops at the end of the video and unloads the video from memory

OOOoyalaPlayerActionAtEndReset 

Pause and reset to the beginning of the current video

enum OOOoyalaPlayerEnvironment

Defines which Ooyala API environment is used for API calls. Defaults to OOOoyalaPlayerEnvironmentProduction and should never change for customer apps.

Enumerator
OOOoyalaPlayerEnvironmentProduction 

Ooyala production environment

OOOoyalaPlayerEnvironmentStaging 

Ooyala staging environment

OOOoyalaPlayerEnvironmentNextStaging 

Ooyala next-staging environment

OOOoyalaPlayerEnvironmentLocal 

Ooyala local environment

Variable Documentation

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerAdCompletedNotification

Fires when an ad completes playing

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerAdErrorNotification

Fires when an error occurs while trying to play an ad

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerAdPodCompletedNotification

Fires when all ads in the ad pod is completed

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerAdPodStartedNotification

Fires when an ad pod containing one ore more ads starts playing

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerAdSkippedNotification

Fires when an ad is skipped

Fires when ads are done loading

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerAdStartedNotification

Fires when an ad starts playing

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerAdTappedNotification

Fires when third party ad is tapped

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerAuthorizationReadyNotification

Fires when the authorization status is ready and can be accessed

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerContentTreeReadyNotification

Fires when the content tree's metadata is ready and can be accessed

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerCurrentItemChangedNotification

Fires when the current item changes

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerErrorNotification

Fires when an error occurs

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerJsonReceivedNotification

Fires when received a json string, userinfo contains the key and value of the json string

NSString* const OOOoyalaPlayerLanguageChangedNotification

Fires when close caption language changed
